body_html: @avostryakov almost. the hidden states, if you concatenate them, will have to run on one of the GPUs, and this will require a copy. however, this is trivial compared to the hard work the LSTM cells are doing in the forwards & backwards passes. So the larger your cell batch size, depth, and number of iterations, the closer the performance should get to 2x.
